title: Real-Life Context-Based Language Instructional Design Studio

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education experience and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based VR environment emphasizing practical language design experiences

learning_goals: Learners analyze real-world language use scenarios in VR environments and produce three or more context-specific design solutions
Learners improve language education materials two or more times through peer feedback-based design critiques
Learners complete one or more mobile-device-compatible language learning simulation modules

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
